Definitely attach another small unmanned pod on to the part that detaches from the rover. Then when you detach the rover, switch between the rover and ship with [ and ]. Hope this helps. (in short just add another unmanned pod)

Ok ill try that. I didnt play for some weeks, and i think it wasnt possible to add more than 1 pod to a ship before... but maybe iam wrong ;-)

Along with adding another control pod, make sure you attach batteries accordingly. Admit it, we've all done it before
As for the second point, you're either talking about FAR for modified aerodynamics or Procedural Fairings for fancy payload fairings.
